item.title: [SCRUM-64] 4.3.1. Verify the display of amount expenses and income
pre-conditions: 2. Chrome browser is installed on desktop;
steps: 1. Login with a valid email and password;
expected results: 1. Main page is loaded. Reports button is visible.
2. Reports page is loaded. Expenses and income are visible;
3. The current month is displayed. The total amounts of income and expenditure for the current month are displayed;
4. The previous month is displayed. The total amounts of income and expenditure for previous month are displayed;
5. December 2023 is displayed. The total amounts of income and expenditure for the selected month are displayed.
